name: compatibility-pattern-scanner
description: Comprehensive scanner for compatibility, mock, and TODO patterns in recent changes
command:
#!/bin/sh
# Get the file that was just modified from the event
read -r event_json
file_path=$(echo "$event_json" | grep -o '"file_path":"[^"]*' | cut -d'"' -f4)

if [ -z "$file_path" ]; then
  exit 0
fi

# Check if it's a code file
case "$file_path" in
  *.js|*.ts|*.jsx|*.tsx|*.py|*.go|*.java|*.c|*.cpp|*.rs|*.rb|*.php|*.swift|*.kt|*.scala|*.sh|*.yaml|*.yml)
    ;;
  *)
    exit 0
    ;;
esac

# Define our search patterns
patterns='(TODO|FIXME|HACK|XXX|TEMP|temporary|workaround|kludge|mock|stub|fake|dummy|placeholder|compat|backward|legacy|deprecated|fallback|polyfill|shim|not[[:space:]]implemented|unimplemented|noop|no-?op|pass[[:space:]]through|passthrough|future|pending|later|eventually|soon|adapter|bridge|wrapper|proxy[[:space:]]pattern|v[0-9]+[[:space:]]compat|old[[:space:]]version|new[[:space:]]version|migration|upgrade[[:space:]]path)'

# Check if file exists and scan it
if [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  # Try to get just the changes first, fall back to scanning whole file (limited)
  changes=$(git diff HEAD -- "$file_path" 2>/dev/null | grep '^+' | grep -v '^+++' || head -50 "$file_path")
  
  # Search for patterns
  found=$(echo "$changes" | grep -iE "$patterns" | head -10)
  
  if [ -n "$found" ]; then
    echo "âš ï¸  Pattern Analysis for $file_path:"
    echo ""
    
    # Categorize findings
    todo_count=$(echo "$found" | grep -icE '(TODO|FIXME|HACK|XXX|TEMP)' || echo 0)
    mock_count=$(echo "$found" | grep -icE '(mock|stub|fake|dummy|placeholder)' || echo 0)
    compat_count=$(echo "$found" | grep -icE '(compat|legacy|deprecated|fallback|polyfill|shim|backward)' || echo 0)
    incomplete_count=$(echo "$found" | grep -icE '(not[[:space:]]implemented|unimplemented|noop|no-?op)' || echo 0)
    
    if [ "$todo_count" -gt 0 ]; then
      echo "ðŸ”´ Found $todo_count TODO/FIXME markers - these need attention"
    fi
    
    if [ "$mock_count" -gt 0 ]; then
      echo "ðŸŸ¡ Found $mock_count mock/stub patterns - verify these are in test files"
    fi
    
    if [ "$compat_count" -gt 0 ]; then
      echo "ðŸ”µ Found $compat_count compatibility patterns - ensure documentation exists"
    fi
    
    if [ "$incomplete_count" -gt 0 ]; then
      echo "ðŸŸ  Found $incomplete_count unimplemented sections - plan implementation"
    fi
    
    echo ""
    echo "First few matches:"
    echo "$found" | head -3 | sed 's/^/  > /'
    
    # Provide actionable advice
    echo ""
    echo "ðŸ’¡ Recommendations:"
    [ "$todo_count" -gt 0 ] && echo "  â€¢ Address TODO/FIXME items before merging"
    [ "$mock_count" -gt 0 ] && echo "  â€¢ Ensure mocks are only in test directories"
    [ "$compat_count" -gt 0 ] && echo "  â€¢ Document compatibility requirements in README"
    [ "$incomplete_count" -gt 0 ] && echo "  â€¢ Create tickets for unimplemented features"
  fi
fi

exit 0
